Title: Ghost Machine
Plot: Whilst chasing a man, Gwen retrieves an unusual machine that allows the user to see back into the past. It is considered dangerous, and no members of Torchwood are permitted to use it. But Owen has other plans, and witnesses a violent murder that took place over forty years ago. Using the information he gathered, Owen starts to track down the still-living murderer.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Daniel Llinos, John Normington, Emily Evans, Christopher Elson, Christopher Greene, Julie Gibbs, Ian Kay, Ryan Conway, Kathryn Howard, Ben McKay, Gareth Thomas
